medical_history.chief_complaint: Dizziness following a syncopal episode after a fall.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports feeling dizzy before the fall but is unsure if she lost consciousness. She was unable to get up after the fall, prompting her to call for help. Currently, she has no dizziness or any other symptoms.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with lymphoma. No neurological complaints in family.
